body_html: @formigone it might not be the case, but you can try lowering the momentum in batch_normalization(..., momentum=0.99, ...), to e.g. 0.9. The default can often be too "smooth", and as a result the validation metrics can be worse since the training forgets past values more slowly

body: @formigone it might not be the case, but you can try lowering the momentum in `batch_normalization(..., momentum=0.99, ...)`, to e.g. `0.9`. The default can often be too "smooth", and as a result the validation metrics can be worse since the training forgets past values more slowly
